artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Ibaya Senzaburō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: right sheet of a vertical ōban diptych
markings: censor seals: 福 {Fuku}, 村松 {Muramatsu}; publisher\'s seal: 三、伊場仙板  {San, Ibasen han}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kanadehon Chūshingura 仮名手本忠臣蔵, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1849, 9th month.
title: Last Half of the Treasury of Loyal Retainers' Night Raid
